cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine so bright. I wake you up with my light! What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out during the day.

cosmos.question: I am round and white and shine at night. Sometimes I am full, sometimes just a sliver of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 You see me when it's dark.
🧀 People say I look like cheese.

cosmos.question: I am small and twinkle way up high. Many of me live in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You can see me at night.
🌟 I am very, very far away.

cosmos.question: It is big and round, and where we live. It has land and water, a place to give. What is it?

hints.text: 🌎 It has lots of green and blue.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture. You can find me in the night, if you're a good star-picker. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us look like animals
🌌 We are made of many stars
⭐ We help you find your way

cosmos.question: Zoom! I carry people to the stars. I'm tall and fast, going far, far, far! What am I?
I am a red planet, very far away. People send robots to visit me one day. What am I?
I am a big, swirling space place, full of stars and dust. My name sounds like a candy, can you trust? What am I?

hints.text: 🍬 My name sounds like a sweet treat

cosmos.question: I have rings around me, made of ice and rock. I am a very big planet, give your brain a shock! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a planet far from Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas, a baby star, I grow and grow until I’m seen from afar. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am made of very hot gases

transport.question: I go 'Vroom Vroom!' and have wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 You see me on the road.
🔑 You need a key to start me.

transport.question: I float on the water and can take you far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and made of metal.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me in the park.
🚳 I need a helmet when I am ridden.
⚙️ I have pedals and a seat.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am big and have wings.
💺 You sit in seats inside me.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?
I travel on tracks and carry many people. What am I?
I can take you to the moon! What am I?
I help put out fires and have a loud siren. What am I?
I help sick people get to the hospital quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have flashing lights and a siren.
🤕 I carry people on a stretcher.

transport.question: I am a car that you can call to take you somewhere. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I am usually yellow or black.
📍 You can hail me on the street.
💰 You pay the driver for the ride.
